overview: Do you think that the COVID-19 pandemic and nuclear war are the only threat to humanity? An engaging film entitled “Marvels of Science: Climate Change” welcomes you again to the world of Science. This explanatory video pursues to educate and entertain its viewers at the same time. Hoping that all ages can understand today's biggest problem and how we can all be a hero to our world, this aims to promote awareness and responsibility to take action. The film encourages people that we don’t have to do something big; simple changes and actions have a significant impact. With Science, imagination, and collaborative effort, positive change is possible!
title: Marvels of Science: Climate Change
